GENERAL.JOB_TITLE: Senior Frontend Engineer â€“ Angular Expert

INFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: A web enthusiast who lives in Lyon. I try to see what is most marvelous in the simplest things. I am creative and have a passionate taste for cinema and music.

During my experience, I have worked both as a freelancer, for short and long missions, and for a final client. I had the opportunity to develop soft skills, such as demonstrating concentration, rigor, patience and tenacity, which allowed me to work independently, both alone and in a team.

In my free time, I enjoy reading articles, watching presentations, and attending meet-ups to keep up to date with different alternatives to the technologies I use every day. I also try to always keep my hand in practicing and using these technologies by creating and updating some personal projects using Supabase, Firebase, Flutter, React, and other frameworks, languages or libraries.

As a front-end engineer, I enjoy bridging the gap between engineering and design combining my technical knowledge with my keen eye for design to create a beautiful product. My goal is to always build applications that are scalable and efficient under the hood while providing engaging, pixel-perfect user experiences.

MASTER.TITLE: Master of Computer Science specialized in Technology of Information

BACHELOR.TITLE: Bachelor of Mathematics and Computer Science

TECHNICAL_SKILLS.TITLE: Technical Skills
TECHNICAL_SKILLS.VALUE: Angular, NgRX, RXJS, Javascript, Typescript, CSS/SASS, HTML, Schematics, NodeJS, NestJS, UI/UX, Accessibility, Design System.

TOOLS.TITLE: Tools
TOOLS.VALUE: NPM, Angular CLI, Lerna, NX, Gulp, Git, GitLab, Jenkins, Nexus, AWS, Visual Studio Code, IntelliJ, Figma, Jira, Confluence.

CONTENT.TITLE: Lead Frontend Developer / Senior Frontend Engineer

PROJECTS.TITLE: Cx Studio
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Web application to help companies define scenarios on customer journeys for multichannel interactions.
DETAILS: Enhanced UI/UX using Mosaic and MosaicNG.
Optimized code to improve run and build time and performance.
Improved code quality by implementing ESLint, Prettier, and Stylelint, and adding guidelines and best practices.
Refactored app, wrote solid and reusable components, and form fields.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Mosaic
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: CSS Framework based on Odigo's Design System.
DETAILS: Developed a rich, fully customizable, and complete CSS framework using NPM, SASS, and Gulp.
Wrote and deployed documentation to help teams use Mosaic: changelogs and documentation.
Developed a themes builder app that adapts Mosaic to any Design system using Angular, Typescript, and Sass.
Worked closely with the design team on improving components, templates, and building automatically generated color palettes fully accessible.
Improved development, deployment, and contribution processes to make the project inner source.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Mosaic NG

DETAILS: Developed generic, performant, documented, and accessible components using Angular, Typescript, NgRx, RXJS.

Improved performance, code quality, and compliance with the UI provided by the design team.
Worked with accessibility experts to make components accessible in all libraries.
Supported worldwide product teams working at Odigo in their usage of Mosaic and Mosaic NG.

Helped improve the relationship between Software Engineers and UX/UI Designers.
Designed project using a micro-frontend architecture approach.
Created the project from scratch, adding needed dependencies, and following NFRs, CoP decisions, best practices, and common guidelines.

PERSONAL_PROJECTS.TITLE: Personal Projects
PERSONAL_PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Most of the projects I have worked on or am still working on are intended for personal use or constitute a training ground with rich context. You can find some examples of these projects here.

DETAILS.TEXT: This app is meant to allow users to have an overview of their budgets in order to make managing their personal projects easier and to have more control over their expenses and incomes. The transactions are set manually to give the user complete control over their data. It is developed using Flutter and Firebase.

At first designed for businesses, this app enables users to keep track of events organized by their companies and groups they belong to, or to suggest events to their groups. It is developed using Flutter and Firebase.

A clone of Slack, which integrates basic functionalities allowing to test realtime databases, deepen some Angular features, and use Baas platforms like Supabase and Firebase. It is developed using Angular, Supabase, NgRX, RXJS, and NgxTranslate.
This project includes multiple sides; a Branding ideation, a design system and multiple apps.

A clean design system that I created a few years ago used to create the screens for my mobile apps. It includes rich color palettes, designed components, typography properties, and spacing specifications. The initial project was made on Adobe XD, and Im trying to move it on Figma, update it, and use Design Tokens.
